Actions: The Raid Monster deals 2 damage to each player and 1 to each creature they control.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
Each player discards a card at random, then draws a card.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:1]
Deal 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker with the lowest CMC on the field.[Instant][CMC:2]
Until the Raid Monster's next turn, creatures players control gain 'When this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to itself.'[Enchantment][CMC:2]
Each player creates a Treasure token, then sacrifices a land.[Sorcery][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster creates ${numberOfPlayers} 5/1 deathtouch enchantment artifact creature in its colors, each one attacks a seperate player this turn.[Creature][CMC:4]
Deal 1 damage to each creature. Any that die this way can't be regenerated.[Sorcery][CMC:2]
Exile the top card of each player's library. Each player may cast it until end of turn.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
Each player loses 1 life for each tapped creature they control.[Sorcery][CMC:2]
Each player sacrifices a land unless they discard a card.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
